div.p: >> BACK OF THE BOOK SEGMENT TONIGHT.
WATTERS WORLD. YOU MAY REMEMBER A COUPLE

TO ASK ABOUT IT AND WAS NOT GREETED WITH ENTHUSIASM.
WHEN WE HEARD THAT BROWN WAS SPONSORING A CLOTHING
OPTIONAL WEEK. WE ASKED WATTERS TO MAN UP
AND GO BACK TO BROWN. >> SO WHAT IS THE MEANING

NUDE. >> WOMEN AND MEN FEELING
BAD ABOUT THEIR WEIGHT. >> I FEEL BAD ABOUT MY

>> YOU DON’T NEED TO THOUGH.
>> PEOPLE WHATEVER THEY WANT WANT TO FURTHER THEIR

BUT IF YOU SHOW ONE NIPPLE EVERYONE GOES CRAZY.

>> I DON’T NEED ANY EXTRA NUDITY IN MY LIFE.

RIGHT NOW. >> YEAH.

ABOUT IT. A LOT OF STUDENTS ARE

CANVAS. >> DID IT TICKLE?
>> I WASN’T UB COMFORTABLE AT ALL.
>> NUDE YOGA. SOUNDS LIKE A STRETCH.

IT WAS SIGNIFICANT. >> HUGE.
>> THANKS. >> HOW MUCH MONEY DO YOU PAY TO

>> TELL MOM IT’S NUDITY WEEK . >> THIS IS JESSE WATERS WITH THE

>> OKAY. >> WHAT, WHAT, WHAT?
